articles.title: World’s biggest hydrogen trucks start work at Anglo American - BusinessTech
articles.description: Anglo American on Friday unveiled the world’s biggest green-hydrogen powered truck at a platinum mine in northeast South Africa where it aims to replace a fleet of 40 diesel-fueled vehicles that each use about a million liters of the fossil fuel every year.
